original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: canterlot boutigue
overview: Rarity achieves her dream of opening her own boutique in Canterlot but when her business partner Sassy Saddles focuses too heavily on one dress Rarity loses her passion for dressmaking, can Rarity reignite her passion or will her boutique close down forever?!
title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: canterlot boutigue
